title: The New Mord is a Dark Souls Boss

replies.body:
Even with a helmet he can pull off the "excuse the fuck out of me" look.

Also, this is a joke, but...
Wow, Riot back at it again with the male sexualization. Not only is Morde not wearing armor on his chest, he's not even wearing fucking skin.

Seriously, though, I'm loving the skeleton.
with all the metal he must weigh a skele**TON**
STOP IT SANS UNDERTALE.
GET OUT

"Goddamn Males and their..."
*flips through notepad*
"Bones."
Mord of the Boreal Valley

_Vordt of Boreal Valley's health drops to zero_

"Lol that was easy as sh-"

_Cutscene starts playing, his body begins to morph. Slowly, he picks up his mace which takes a new form. A new name now appears over the healt bar. **M o r d e k a i s e r**_

"I think i'm in trouble."

Is my metal man showing some Bone right there? 
https://i.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/970/518/463.jpg
IS THAT THE SPLASH ART!?

Indeed it is 

{{sticker:sg-syndra}}

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/no-game-no-life/images/4/40/View_Gallery.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/350?cb=20171116090049
Lookin good!

Finally riot designing a champion correctly.

*morde killing people and destroying every building in his path*

*random soldier hits him with sword from behind and it breaks*

*morde turns around*

ronan the accuser voice "what are you doing?"
perfect

My time has come, the light will prevail!

https://i.imgur.com/ibx7SiV.jpg

You know what's up.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
His new ult and the way his splash art makes it look like he is the center of this dead shattered world makes me think of Oryx from Destiny's Taken King expansion.

RIP supportkaiser
{{champion:82}} {{item:3504}}
Old Morde looks like he came from some demented cartoon when you compare him with this.  He's sexy now :D

As a DS speedrunner -> Still gets destroyed by a hamster with a blowgun. 
Its the equivalent of destroying Soul of Cinder lvl 1 with a Broadsword :D.
Welp, time to blast Papyrus' theme when playing this fucker.

Spiky - Check 
Shadow Realm  - Check 
Dark - Check 

Yugi? Is that you?
No, he’s some big-shot Hive or Taken leader from the Destiny series.  He even has a throne world.
he just looks and acts like suaron from  lord of the rings to be honest
looks more like a Transformer to me.
not lying i saw the video of mords rework and instantly started listening to metal

Gravelord Mord
Mord the Rock
Mord, Father of the Abyss

your right about maining him, but you may have to go blind.
I mean depending on how op he is.
when riot reworked akali she got perma-banned.
yeet{{champion:84}}
He's basically Black Phantom Garl Vinland but **angrier.**
Someone figure out how to summon Malicious Metal, I want to know his thoughts.
I'm so looking forward to this coming out.
That awkward "wat" look when the enemy soldiers sword just shatters on his armor lol
Boss? Definitely not, but he'd make a good Black Knight variation.
I can't believe I'm about to come back to this game.
he kinda looks like the witch king from lord of the rings or Sauron?
To be fair, he reminded me heavily of Sauron way before this rework. He pretty much IS the Sauron of League of Legends, both old and new.
Absolutely glorious.
I'unno but holy shit it looks like a champ I'm gonna main
You'll get no arguments from me, he looks Like he'd fit in completely with Dark Souls
